Control.Name: Button_MouseOverSelection
Control.Tooltip: Automatically targets the player you are hovering over if that player is in-range

Control.Name: Button_RememberPrevTarget
Control.Tooltip: Automatically returns to your previous target when you are no longer hovering over any bars. Requires "Target on MouseOver" to be enabled.

Control.Name: Button_DisableFrames
Control.Tooltip: Warning: This will disable the raid frames. Intended for Grid users that need some functionality from the RaidFrames AddOn but don't actually want to see the raid frames.

Control.Name: Button_ConsistentIconOffset
Control.Tooltip: Ensures that bars align properly, even if only some bars have a valid icon.

Control.Text: These are advanced settings. If you do not know what the settings do please leave them to prevent undesired results, such as funky-looking bars because of a very slow update timer.
Control.Name: WarningText

Control.Text: Bar Art updates the bars when people go out of range, die, or go offline.
Control.Name: ExplainTextBarArt

Control.Text: Boost/Food tracker is for how often the food/boost buffs are checked when the option to display these icons is enabled.
Control.Name: ExplainFoodBoostTracker

Control.Text: The Main Timer determines how often bar frames are updated. This includes the text overlays and drawing the HP/Shield/Absorb bar as well as the debuff tracker. This is the most resource-intensive function.
Control.Name: ExplainMainUpdater
